content: @all Please sign this petition. https://www.change.org/p/google-don-t-dissolve-google-code-in?recruiter=910722601&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink&utm_campaign=tap_basic_share IF YOU DON'T WANT TO GO GCI AWAY.

This is amazing @Thusal Ranawaka

It's heartwarming to see all the love for GCI, so much that there's an organized community response. Wonderful.
